title: By the Quene. Forasmuche as the tyme wherein common interludes in the Englishe tongue ar wont vsually to be played ... The Quenes Maiestie doth straightly forbyd al maner interludes to be playde eyther openly or priuately, except the same be notified before hande ...
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I)
publisher: In Poules churchyarde, by Rychard Iugge and Iohn Cawood printers to the Quenes Maiestie,
